description: Two Toasters is looking for Mobile Developers to join our team. At Two Toasters, you will be working with cutting edge technology to build state of the art iOS and Android applications with a team that enjoys working hard and playing ping pong.

description: Join us in the Tech Villa and develop the next killer Android App with an exceptionally team at doo. If you're a senior Android developer with a passion for building kick-ass apps, we look forward to hearing from you! Check out what its like to work at doo. https://doo.net/de/jobs.html
title: doo - focus on building something great

description: Your job will be to develop Android Apps in a friendly, fair and relaxedworking environment.You should enjoy programming and constant learning andhave a sense for clean, reusable code. Knowledge of other programminglanguages than Java is a plus.
title: Android App Developer at The App Guys

description: DataDroid is an Android Library which will ease the developement of Android applications when you have to manage local data or to call REST webservices for remote data.

description: Inscription is an open source library to display information about your Android app.

description: AsyncTaskFragment is an Android library project designed to help you to perform background operations and publish results on the UI thread from your fragment without having to manipulate threads and/or handlers.
title: AsyncTaskFragment
